name: annotationInit
author: Melodie Cassan / Sim&Cure
description: Annotation Initalization of arteries and aneurysm. An application for performing predictive inference using MONAI on 3DRA images
command-line: unzip [DICOM_INPUT] -d INPUTDIR; mkdir OUTDIR; ln -s /app/model.pt model.pt; ln -s /app/segment_attributes.json segment_attributes.json; python /app/predict.py INPUTDIR OUTDIR && cp /inv/*-invocation.json OUTDIR/input_params.json && tar -cvzf [OUTPUT_FILE] OUTDIR && rm -rf OUTDIR INPUTDIR model.pt segment_attributes.json; chmod -R 777 *

inputs.name: T2 dicom_input (ZIP)
inputs.description: Zip archive of Input medical images in DICOM format.

output-files.description: Tarball containing results, including predictions and converted DICOM files
output-files.name: Output archive
